channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What Is Lossless Audio, and Do You Really Need It?
item.description: Lossless audio is the first step toward audio nirvana. But what is it, does it really make a difference, and how can you get it? Here’s what to know.

item.title: 8 Best Planners of 2026: Roterunner, Hobonichi, Kokuyo
item.description: Digital tools are not always superior. Here are some WIRED-tested paper agendas and notebooks to keep you on track.

item.title: The 17 Best Gifts for Plant Lovers We’d Buy Ourselves (2025)
item.description: Plant parents don’t always want another plant—up your gift-giving game with these favorite plant presents we've tested.

item.title: Sequoia partner spreads debunked Brown shooting theory, testing new leadership

item.title: Trump’s Agriculture Bailout Is Alienating His MAHA Base
item.description: The administration’s pro-industry tilt—across three executive agencies—is feeding the MAHA movement’s growing discontent.

item.title: ‘It felt so wrong’: Colin Angle on iRobot, the FTC, and the Amazon deal that never was
item.description: The iRobot founder opens up about the 18-month regulatory process that he says doomed the Roomba maker -- and what it means for American innovation.

item.title: New York Governor Kathy Hochul signs RAISE Act to regulate AI safety
item.description: The bill will require large AI developers to publish information about their safety protocols and report safety incidents to the state within 72 hours...

item.title: OpenAI allows users to directly adjust ChatGPT’s enthusiasm level
item.description: ChatGPT users can now tweak the chatbot’s warmth, enthusiasm, and emoji use.

item.title: Google and Apple reportedly warn employees on visas to avoid international travel

item.title: Best Nintendo Switch 2 Controllers (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Get a grip on gaming with the best controller options for Nintendo’s latest handheld console.
